  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationContext, WritableConfigurationContext
    public class MemoryConfigurationContext
extends AbstractWritableConfigurationContext
    ConfigurationContext that stores content in memory only (not persisting it).

    Daniel Sagenschneider
